author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes #28852. Before doing it, I took a round of traversing also untracked `PSet` and `VPSet` because I wanted to replace `pythonTypeName()` with `isinstance` for the type inspection.

For normal modules the `MassSearchReplaceParamVisitor` checks only the given parameter name, i.e. it does not descend into nested PSets. For `SwitchProducer` I **believe** the expected behavior would be to do the replacement for each contained `EDProducer`/`EDAlias`.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run.
title: Add support for untracked PSets and SwitchProducer to MassReplace tools
